column4: hey guys I installed libopenal0a for a video game,  and now my sound wont work. The game wont even run without this "libopenal0a" installed so I am at a loss. Can anyone help?
what sound issue are you having exactly?
like you cant hear anything if you load up rhythmbox? or you dont hear anything from the game?
my ubuntu kernel version is 2.6.31-17-generic and I recently installed libopenal0a for the purpose of making a video game work. When I installed libopenal0a
not sure if uninstalling will fix it. not sure about what the problem might be.
